Anne was awarded the University of Michigan [Research Scout Award](https://medresearch.umich.edu/office-research/about-office-research/research-scouts) for the project "Real-Time In Vivo Adapative Stimulus Response Mapping", with our collaborators [Dr. Elise Savier](https://www.savierlab.com) and [Dr. Christian Burgess](https://www.burgesslab.org).
